title: quarkus build fails: Could not resolve dependencies for project io.quarkus:quarkus-integration-test-webjars-locator:jar:999-SNAPSHOT
body:
### Describe the bug

Since #40066 the quarkus build fails, since the integration test part was forgotten to get renamed? We see this failing in some of our [Mandrel CI](https://github.com/graalvm/mandrel/actions/runs/8795705939/job/24137525762#step:10:64266) jobs. Looks like this:

```

[ERROR] Failed to execute goal on project quarkus-integration-test-webjars-locator: Could not resolve dependencies for project io.quarkus:quarkus-integration-test-webjars-locator:jar:999-SNAPSHOT: The following artifacts could not be resolved: io.quarkus:quarkus-webjars-locator:jar:999-SNAPSHOT (absent), io.quarkus:quarkus-webjars-locator-deployment:pom:999-SNAPSHOT (absent): Could not find artifact io.quarkus:quarkus-webjars-locator:jar:999-SNAPSHOT -> [Help 1]
[ERROR]
```

Steps to reproduce:
```
$ rm -rf ~/.m2/repository/io/quarkus/quarkus-webjars-locator*
$ JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-17-openjdk ./mvnw clean install -Dquickly
```
